VisCrit: Instructor creates an instance of VisCrit that points to a URL continaing an instance of this workbook file (well, a subset of this file, just the 'Rubric' through 'Parameters' sheets. This file contains everything needed for Viscrit to find images, show rubric, prompts, etc, see below
Prompt for password if 'SitePassword' isn't NULL in Parameters worksheet
VisCrit displays interface based on that file, user selected from possible images in box above image
VisCrit displays 'OnEntry' Popups as described in Parameters Worksheet
General View Worksheet: Every time user adds a critique by pushing (+) button in hierarchy, a row is added to VisCrit's internal databse (autosaving progress).
Critique Entry View: Shows how a critique is added

There is no 'save' button, only 'download' of an xls version of their outputfile. Don't let them download until they have entered critiques for all Rubric entries (see Rubric sheet) where 'isMandatory' is true

__EMPTY_2: UI view when a critique is being added
Shows what to put in the Rubric box
Explains each column in Rubric sheet
String display names for available filename list, and PNG file to display in the window.
Show these string values in the dropdown for available Critiquer IDs
Text prompts  to display (with OK button) for pre-defined stages, like 'OnEntry' or 'OnSubmit', in the sequence order specified
Specification for the output file - this won't be in the inputfile, this should be what VisCrit creates and saves locally, and also the format of the user's local copy
